Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) can refrigerated jumbo buttermilk biscuits

Ingredients.2: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles

Ingredients.5: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange biscuits 1 to 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 13 to 15 minutes.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, cook sausage in a large skillet over medium heat until thoroughly heated, stirring frequently, about 5 to 6 minutes.

Directions.3: Stir in flour until well combined. Gradually add milk, stirring continuously, until the gravy thickens and comes to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer and stir for 2 more minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Split biscuits in half. Place 2 halves on each of 8 plates; top with about 1/3 cup gravy.
